summary: Male twins are separated at birth and live their lives in different backgrounds - until one gets abducted.
cast: N.T. Rama Rao Jr.|Nayanthara|Sheela Kaur|Ananth|Raghu Babu|Tanikella Bharani|Brahmanandam|Mukul Dev|Raghu Kumar Karumanchi|Lakshman Rao Kondavalasa|Venu Madhav|Mahesh Manjrekar|M.S. Narayana|Nassar|Vinaya Prakash|Prudhviraj|Rajyalakshmi|Ramaprabha|C.V.L. Narasimha Rao|Raja Ravindra|Sayaji Shinde|Sudha|Fish Venkat|Ashish Vidyarthi
title: Adhurs
